TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebContext extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Manages the path context for the current Web application. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Web.Configuration.WebApplicationLevel pathLevel, string site, string applicationPath, string path, string locationSubPath, string appConfigPath) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the Web site.
The virtual path of the root level of the current Web application.
The virtual path of the Web.config file that the current configuration object represents.
The path value of the element that is currently being edited.
The current Web application's configuration path.
